title: # 532 - Meals By Cug & ME
itunes:title: # 532 - Meals By Cug & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with Tiktok/Instagram star, Meals By Cug aka Danny Mondello. We talk about LA vs NY Bagels, making money as an influencer, growing up on Staten Island, our favorite restaurants, and much more! 

 

Follow Cugine

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/meals_by_cug

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@meals_by_cug?is_from_webapp=1&sender_device=pc 

 

This episode is brought to you by Manscaped. Get 20% Off and Free Shipping with the code BERT at http://www.Manscaped.com
